name: Assasin's Creed
short_desc: The plot is set in a fictional history of real world events and follows the centuries-old struggle.
description: The plot is set in a fictional history of real world events and follows the centuries-old struggle between the Assassins, who fight for peace with free will, and the Templars, who desire peace through control. The story is set in  the mid-18th century during the Seven Years' War, and follows Shay Patrick Cormac, an Assassin-turned-Templar who hunts down former members of his Brotherhood after being betrayed by them. Gameplay in Rogue is very similar to that of Black

name: World Of Warcraft
short_desc: The plot is set in a fictional history of real world events and follows the cent
description: The plot is set in a fictional history of real world events and follows the centuries-old struggle between the  Assassins, who fight for peace with free will, and the Templars, who desire peace through control.                     The story is set in  the mid-18th century during the Seven Years' War, and follows Shay Patrick Cormac, an                    Assassin-turned-Templar who hunts down former members of his Brotherhood after being betrayed by them. Gameplay in Rogue is very similar to that of Black Flag with a mixture of ship-based naval exploration and third-person land-based exploration with some new features.
